statements: SELECT submission_text, researcher_id FROM submissions WHERE submission_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM submissions WHERE researcher_id = 5;
SELECT submission_id FROM submissions WHERE researcher_id > 3;
SELECT submission_text FROM submissions WHERE researcher_id <= 2;
SELECT * FROM submissions WHERE submission_text LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM submissions WHERE submission_id = 1;
SELECT submission_text, researcher_id FROM submissions WHERE researcher_id = 5;
SELECT submission_id, submission_text FROM submissions WHERE researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY submission_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM submissions WHERE researcher_id IN (3, 4, 6) ORDER BY submission_id ASC;
SELECT submission_id, submission_text FROM submissions WHERE submission_id < 10 AND researcher_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM submissions WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT submission_id, submission_date FROM submissions WHERE submission_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT submission_id, review_date FROM reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT submission_id, submission_content, review_content FROM submissions JOIN reviews ON submissions.submission_id = reviews.submission_id;
SELECT reviewer_id, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM reviews GROUP BY reviewer_id HAVING review_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM submissions;
SELECT submission_id, researcher_id FROM submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT submission_id, submission_date, submission_content FROM submissions WHERE researcher_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT submission_id, reviewer_id, review_date, review_content FROM reviews WHERE submission_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM submissions;
SELECT submission_title, submission_date FROM submissions WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT submission_title, submission_content FROM submissions WHERE submission_title LIKE '%research%';
SELECT submission_id, submission_date FROM submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating_value) AS average_rating FROM ratings;
SELECT submission_id, submission_title FROM submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY review_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT submission_id, COUNT(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM reviews GROUP BY submission_id ORDER BY num_reviews DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT submission_title, AVG(rating_value) AS avg_rating FROM submissions INNER JOIN ratings ON submissions.submission_id = ratings.submission_id GROUP BY submission_title ORDER BY avg_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT submission_title, submission_content FROM submissions WHERE submission_id NOT IN (SELECT submission_id FROM reviews) ORDER BY submission_title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM submissions;
SELECT submission_title, submission_date FROM submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_affiliation FROM researchers WHERE researcher_affiliation = 'University';
SELECT submission_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM ratings GROUP BY submission_id;
SELECT * FROM submissions;
SELECT submission_title, submission_date FROM submissions WHERE submission_id = 'abc123';
SELECT r.researcher_name, s.submission_title FROM researchers r JOIN submissions s ON r.researcher_id = s.researcher_id;
SELECT s.submission_title, COUNT(r.rating) as total_ratings FROM submissions s LEFT JOIN ratings r ON s.submission_id = r.submission_id GROUP BY s.submission_title;
SELECT s.submission_title, SUM(r.rating) as total_rating_sum FROM submissions s LEFT JOIN ratings r ON s.submission_id = r.submission_id GROUP BY s.submission_title ORDER BY total_rating_sum DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, expertise_area FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT submission_id, submission_date, submission_text FROM submissions WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_id, review_date, review_text FROM reviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT submission_id, reviewer_name, rating_value FROM ratings WHERE rating_value >= 3 ORDER BY submission_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, expertise_area FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT submission_text, submission_date FROM submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT review_text, review_date, reviewer_name FROM reviews WHERE submission_id = 1;
SELECT submission_id, MAX(rating_value) AS highest_rating FROM ratings GROUP BY submission_id;
